thread.title: BRIEF-China Harmony New Energy Auto Announces Cooperation Agreement With China Continent Property & Casualty Insurance

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Harmony New Energy Auto Announces Cooperation Agreement With China Continent Property & Casualty Insurance

organizations.name: china harmony new energy auto holding ltd

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - China Harmony New Energy Auto Holding Ltd :
* ‍ENTER STRATEGIC COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH CHINA CONTINENT PROPERTY & CASUALTY INSURANCE
* AGREEMENT FOR COOPERATION IN CHINESE DOMESTIC INSURANCE BUSINESS, INVESTMENT AND FINANCING BUSINESS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
